item.title: By: Indy
item.dc:creator: Indy
item.description:
WOW Insider reported this, that the domain wowarmory.com having expired that day, and speculating some other registrant had snapped it up immediately.
http://www.wowinsider.com/2008/03/02/godaddy-invades-wow-armory/
item.content:encoded:
WOW Insider reported this, that the domain wowarmory.com having expired that day, and speculating some other registrant had snapped it up immediately.

http://www.wowinsider.com/2008/03/02/godaddy-invades-wow-armory/

item.title: By: MH
item.dc:creator: MH
item.description: Nereus - do you happen to use a sig on the forums at all? If you've posted with your main with that same sig, they can usually backtrack and find that.
item.content:encoded: Nereus – do you happen to use a sig on the forums at all? If you’ve posted with your main with that same sig, they can usually backtrack and find that.

item.title: By: Nereus
item.dc:creator: Nereus
item.description: I've always wondered how you can link someone's forum troll account to their main? I made a post a few weeks back with a low level on a separate realm to ask a sort of noob question and people started commenting on my main's arena ratings :P
item.content:encoded: I’ve always wondered how you can link someone’s forum troll account to their main? I made a post a few weeks back with a low level on a separate realm to ask a sort of noob question and people started commenting on my main’s arena ratings ðŸ˜›

item.title: By: Bitt
item.dc:creator: Bitt
item.description:
Blizzard's subdomain address for the Armory is still working.
http://armory.worldofwarcraft.com/
Wondering if this is a DNS snafu or Blizzard wasn't quick enough on a domain renewal. Either way it was an amusing discovery over the weekend.
item.content:encoded:
Blizzard’s subdomain address for the Armory is still working.

http://armory.worldofwarcraft.com/

Wondering if this is a DNS snafu or Blizzard wasn’t quick enough on a domain renewal. Either way it was an amusing discovery over the weekend.
